attributes.action: Reduce VAT on bars and restaurants
attributes.additional_details: VAT on restaurants is so high that the evidence of failures and struggle to pay VAT is 100% evident in the government for many years and is not being addressed. It’s come up in fast food but ignores to be rectified many years ago. We need this change as a factor in the industry. Just looking at the news restaurants are closing and VAT is an issue along with other taxes. It’s destroying business and needs urgent change and not to be ignored. Even the fact of a business turnover under 1 million
attributes.background:
VAT on Restaurants is to high and as a low price and low margins is causing more failures. Selling a menu item at £10.00 £2.00 is VAT making it expensive to eat out. 

We don’t get VAT back on food as it doesn’t have vat. So all cooked food jumps up in price. VAT is not considered by customers.
